00037 class ProcessListBoxItem : public QListBoxText
00038 {
00039 public:
00040     enum Type { Diagnostic, Normal, Error };
00041     
00042     ProcessListBoxItem(const QString &s, Type type);
00043 
00044     inline virtual bool isCustomItem(){return false;};
00045 
00046     inline QColor color(){
00047       return ((t==Error)? Qt::darkRed : (t==Diagnostic)? Qt::black : Qt::darkBlue);
00048     };
00049     
00050 private:
00051     virtual void paint(QPainter* p);
00052     Type t;
00053 };
